investment_advice.summary: Overall +11.29% ROI. Portfolio heavily weighted to Icons (Rivendell) and Nintendo sets. Good diversification across Technic supercars.

recommendations.reason: Icons 10316 Rivendell - 4 copies at €1,759.96 value. LOTR license is rare. Hold for long-term appreciation post-retirement.
Japanese Cherry Blossom Art (31218) - Up 60%. If you can find at retail, this is hot right now.
71438 Super Mario World - Retiring soon. Value should pop after full retirement.
New 2025-2026 Speed Champions sets are down 12% - normal for retail availability. Wait 2-3 years post-retirement.
Christmas sets (40499, 40573) are down now but spike 30-50% around Nov-Dec. Hold for holiday season.

risk_assessment.notes: Heavy concentration in Rivendell (28% of portfolio value). Diversified themes offset single-set risk. Many new releases still at retail = short-term depreciation expected.
